reviews.review:
The game is celebrating it's 5 year anniversary with the inability to deliver the Resident Evil map with the DLC but had no problem advertising the map to draw people in. The game may have grown in age, but the developers have not grown in competence one bit. Survivor queue times longer than the games themselves, even during the game's all time peak. 

Poor balancing makes most killer games easy with half a brain, yet killer continues to get buffed from outcry by the community. Survivor has the potential to be fun, but the aforementioned killer role has been buffed so hard over the years. Combine a decent killer, meta perks, and toxic tactics and you've got consecutive, effortless wins, lobbies of mad people that waited 10+ minutes to get crapped on, and another lobby of victims in under 30 seconds. I've put plenty of time in both roles and Rank 1 in those roles enough seasons to know that this game strayed from the right path long ago

Players with multiple game bans and VAC bans on their profile, still obviously hacking.

 A community so divided and toxic that all logic goes out the window on every topic. Even mods on Reddit mod with bias.

There was never a point in this game's lifespan that I would recommend it to anyone and that continues today.

Ce jeu est un excellent jeu de type "survival". Peu importe si vous préférer être le tueur ou le survivant, vous serez combler.

Одной(-му), без своей тимы нежелательно играть, так как задняя часть тела будет периодический пылать/взрываться, причин много - лаги, баги, тупая тима, фейскемперы, бодиблочеры и т.д. С друзьями по фану можно поиграть. И еще, если попался отличный маньяк - всплекс адреналина, потные ладошки и интересная получасовая-сорокоминутная катка гарантируется. Правда багов докуя и куча, но что же делать, как говорят мои друзья "Это ДБД детка!". Все равно люблю гада, в смысле ДБД))))

Despite a clashing community on what is more OP or needs balancing, the killer or the survivors, this game has a lot of thrills as a survivor and satisfaction as a killer catching his prey. The matchmaking needs work as far as matching you up with people of your skill level but as far as how you rank up seems pretty solid and fair. Love or hate them, you can't say the Developers are not vocal regardless if it is something you want to hear or not and is active on updating their game.

The killer dictates your game. You are in their territory. If you are caught and they decide to camp you there is little you can do at this point I'm writing this review. Gotta just take the loss and move on. 

Use your best judgement in filtering out salty reviews with thumbs down and those that have legitimate passionate concerns. If you are like me and play to have fun and try to personally do your best you'll love this game.

このゲーム、非常におすすめです。

簡単に内容を説明すると、5人のプレイヤーがそれぞれ殺人鬼(1人)と生存者(4人)に別れて鬼ごっこで対決をします。殺人鬼は生存者を捕まえてフックに吊るせば勝利、生存者は鬼から隠れて発電機を修理し出口から脱出すれば勝利というわかりやすい勝敗設定です。

基本的な遊び方として、殺人鬼としてプレイすると1人称視点で視界が悪く、生存者に近づくとこちらの心音が相手に聞こえてしまうので、生存者の発見はすごく難しいです。じゃあ、どうやって捕まえるのか？
生存者は行動をミスすると大きな音を立てるのでそれをもとに探したり、生存者が走ったり流血すれば痕跡が残るのでその跡をたどっていきます。発見さえしてしまえば、生存者より速い足を活かして一気に仕留める！探索の難しさもあって、生存者を捕まえたときはこの上ない達成感を味わえます。

一方生存者は3人称視点の広い視界でプレイできます。殺人鬼に見つからないよう発電機を修理し、脱出を目指します。でも、基本的に攻撃手段はありません。だったら、前述のように足の遅い生存者は見つかったらおしまいなのか？
もし見つかっても、障害物を駆使して何とか逃げることができます。いつ鬼が現れるかという恐怖感と、脱出できた時の安堵感を求めて何度もプレイしてしまいます。

上記のほかに殺人鬼は罠を仕掛けたり透明化したり、生存者はロッカーに隠れたり殺人鬼のフックを破壊したりと様々な戦術もゲームを盛り上げてくれます。各殺人鬼・生存者にも個性があり、ひとつを極めるのもいろいろなキャラでプレイするのも楽しいでしょう。

難点を挙げるとすれば、初心者でも上級者と対戦になることがよくあったり、接続がうまくいかずに試合が始まらない・途中退出者が多くいることでしょう。上級者にやられても大丈夫なメンタルの方、試合前、試合中に固まっても再起動が苦にならない方にはとてもおすすめのゲームです。

セール時購入がお財布にやさしいですが、ノンセール時でも買って損はない作品です。

Bir ormanın içinde 4 genç..
Bir de katil...
Acaba kaçabilecekler mi?
Bugün sizlerle paylaşacağım oyun, son günlerde gittikçe popüler olmaya başlayan: Dead By Daylight.
Behaviour Digital Inc. Tarafından geliştirilen oyunun ana teması, aksiyon. Gerçi bana göre ana teması hayatta kalma esaslı korku. Sebebini birazdan açıklayacağım.

Dead By Daylight‘ın içeriğine ve oynanışına değinecek olursak;
Oyun lobileri -katil ile birlikte- toplamda 5 kişiye kadar destekliyor. Her oyuna başladığınızda farklı harita ile başlıyorsunuz. Böylelikle, bir haritada devamlı oynayarak oyundan baymamış oluyorsunuz.
Oynayabileceğiniz iki taraf var, hayatta kalanlar ve katil.

Hayatta kalanlardan birisiyseniz, ana göreviniz  harita içindeki 5 jeneratörü çalıştırıp, kaçış kapısına doğru koşarak onu açıp geçmek. Tabii işler bu kadar kolay değil. Eğer katilin kurduğu bir tuzağa yakalanırsanız,etrafınızda size yardım edebilecek bir takım arkadaşınız yoksa,geçmiş olsun. Katil sizi her an o kaslı kollarına alıp, asabilir.
Kaçarken, jeneratörleri çalıştırırken,arkadaşlarınızı kurtarırken  oldukça sessiz olmalısınız. En ufak bir çıtırtıda katil yerinizi öğrenebilir.
Katilin size yakın olup olmadığını, artan kalp atış sesinden ve müzikten anlayabiliyorsunuz. Katilden kaçarken, etrafta interaktif bir şekilde kullanabileceğiniz eşyalar var. Eğer doğru zamanda kullanırsanız katili sersemletip, kendinize kaçış için zaman yaratabilirsiniz.

Eğer katilseniz, işiniz biraz zor. Yakışıklı mı yakışıklı Jason’a benziyorsunuz. Gerçi ne kadar yakışıklı, tartışılır. Karşınızda sizin işkence ortamınızdan kaçmaya çalışan 4 kişi var ve kazanmak için hepsini öldürmek zorundasınız. Jeneratörlerin yakınına kapanlar kurarak onları yavaşlatabilir, elinizdeki baltayla sırtlarına vurup onları yere düşürebilirsiniz. Daha sonra o kaslı kollarınızın arasına aldığınız kurbanınızı asarak ölüme terk edebilirsiniz. Hayatta kalanlar gelip, astığınız kişiyi kurtarabilirler. Ölene kadar, bir süre yakınında durmak en mantıklısı. Şunu demeden geçmeyelim,eğer belirli bir sürede yakaladığınız kişiyi asamazsanız,kurban sizi gıdıklayarak elinizden kaçabiliyor. Evet, evet bildiğiniz katili gıdıklayabiliyor karakterler. Herkesi tamamen öldürdüğünüzde, oyunun kazananı siz oluyorsunuz.

Dead by Daylight’ta doyurucu olan en güzel özellik ise, karakterlerinizi geliştirebileceğiniz bir yetenek ağacı, tuzaklar, kıyafetler bölümü var. Yeteneklerinizi geliştirdikçe elinizde fener, ilk yardım çantası gibi ekipmanlarla oyuna girebiliyor ve bunlar sayesinde bir tık önde olabiliyorsunuz.
Aynı durum katil için de geçerli, tuzaklarınızı geliştirip, baltanızı daha güçlü hâle getirdikten sonra masumları elinizden kaçırmadan, öldürebilirsiniz.

Neden bana göre oyunun ana teması korku onu hemen açıklayayım. Hayatta kalanlar tarafında oynuyorsanız oyun kesinlikle korku bazlı bir aksiyon oluyor. Saklandığınız yerde katil bir anda arkanızdan çıkıp, size baltasını saplayınca gerçekten yerinizden sıçrıyorsunuz. Jeneratörleri çalıştırırken nerden gelecek diye etrafınıza bakınırken, bir anda jeneratöre doğru döndüğünüzde katilin dibinizde belirivermesi gerçekten aşırı korkunç. Bundan dolayı, bana göre ana teması hayatta kalma esaslı korkudur. Gerçi katilseniz, o korkuyu siz yaşatıyorsunuz. Bu da bayağı bir eğlenceli.

最近のパッチにより少しキャラクターのレベル上げがしやすくなり、新規の方も少し入りやすくなったかもしれない。
ただ、ラグのある部屋の存在や、マッチングに時間がかかる、マッチングしても無限ロード、もしくはそれに近いものの発生でテンポよく１試合１試合を進められないなどの、まだまだ問題点の多いゲームでもある。
しかし、やり込めばやり込むほどに面白い、と思わせる何かがこのゲームにはあるのである。セールのこの期間に、この未完成なスルメゲーを楽しんでみるのもありではなかろうか。　　
PS　ドワイト（メガネかけた男子）はごみ、はっきりわかんだね。

I got this game on sale because people said it was worth it, if it was on sale, IT IS NOT WORTH IT, THE AMOUNT OF CASH YOU'RE PAYING IS WAY TOO MUCH, take evolved for example, same concept, same idea, guess what, it became free, because the devs didn't pay enough respect to the player community, and the Devs on this game are going on the same path, GREED CORP INCOMING, So, this is the rate:

Pros:
Cool mechanics
Fluid and responsive
Good ambience
It can scare the crap out of you

Cons:
The skils are completly unbalanced,
you got op skills and skills that make no sense being in the game as they are utterly useless.
some characters are just plain garbage, you wont be able to use them anyway, so keep to the same characters as everyone.
No Dev supp.
More content in DLCs (the main game doesnt have near enough content for the price of 20 Euros in my opinion)
Match making is a disaster.
Survivors are just plain broken, if they charge at the "assasin" and keep healing themselfs up at each hit, no way around it :|
Graphs are way way way inferior to what was expected from ultra settings.
Buggy as fuck, cant spend more than 10min without bugs,
Crashes are going to be your new daily meal.

TLDR:
Don't buy it unless you can get it for less than 8 euros, then sure, why not, what the heck, even spend ingame money, whatever.
The devs don't want this game to live, so it won't.

Amazing game with fresh idea on killers and survivors. I like how the dev put so much effort into this game that they keep balancing and fixing issues to make the game better,not to mention the precious interaction between the dev and the gamer with the twitch stream.I really appreciate their gesture to interact and listen to their fans.They know what they are doing and they don't just listen to one side of things.There's always surprise whenever a new killer and survivor were released and they always bring something new to the table with that.There's just something unique and refreshing with so many possibilities within every match you play.

I'm really happy to revisit this game and see how it's progressed. It had a rocky start but the developers believed in what they made and stuck to it and it's paid off in dividends. My initial review was a thumbs down but it hurt me to do it because the potential was so high. I'm happy to say this game has worked out many (if not all) of the bugs that plagued it at the onset.

No matter the role you play, you will have fun with this game. The only time you might not is if, as the survivor, you get caught early or, as the killer, you just really struggle with catching a survivor/get outplayed. That's really all I currently find to be a con of the game in it's current state. The fact that it's just one game mode can and will be a turn off to some but I think the game shines here because even if it only does one thing, it does it extremely well. It's the kind of game you pick up and play and if you get tired of it, you play something else for a while but you know you'll come back for more.

A big shout out to Behaviour Interactive for sticking to their product, that you could tell by watching any videos on them and this game that they cared deeply for. They live and breathe this game and it shows and I think that's awesome.

Very spooky and fun to play with friends.
Though... there are some problems.

Most of the time the game works fine, but I have to have it on the lowest quality graphics and resolution to be able to play it and even then sometimes the lag is unbearable. I really would like to be able to see the full quality of the maps while still being able to play the game.

On the topic of maps, there are not very many but I can tell that more are slowly being added!
Hopefully there are more maps that are just as fun to play as Haddonfield. (It's my favorite, the other ones seem too similar tbh.) Also more room for character customization would be nice. ^_^

My biggest problem though, is that after i've finished playing the game and have closed it, Steam says that it is still running. This causes me to not be able to play any other games or close Steam, so I eventually have to go into Task Manager and end it manually. Another problem with bugs is that when I try to use the Survive With Friends mode, the party moves to the main lobby but all players wind up being kicked out. It's very weird and has happened frequently.

There has also been problems where the killer is stuck in place throughout the entire round, causing survivors to take advantage of it. It really takes me out of the horror mood when this happens. 

Over all I truly love this game and would reccomend it, ... but these things DO NEED FIXED!!! 
I've seen other reviews talk about this as well as countless discussion posts, so I hope this helps get the point across.

~
